content.4: I charge you, O daughters of Jerusalem, that ye stir not up, nor awake
content.6: Set me as a seal upon thine heart, as a seal upon thine arm: for love
content.7: Many waters cannot quench love, neither can the floods drown it: if
content.8: We have a little sister, and she hath no breasts: what shall we do for our sister in the day when she shall be spoken for?
content.11: Solomon had a vineyard at Baal-hamon; he let out the vineyard unto keepers; every one for the fruit thereof was to bring a thousand
content.13: Thou that dwellest in the gardens, the companions hearken to thy voice: cause me to hear
content.14: Make haste, my beloved, and be thou like to a roe or to a young hart upon the mountains of spices.
